articles.title: “Jaw-Dropping” New Clues to Future Ice Sheet Change From Ancient Ice Age Valleys - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Deep valleys buried under the seafloor of the North Sea record how the ancient ice sheets that used to cover the UK and Europe expelled water to stop themselves from collapsing. A new study greatly surprised the research team, who discovered that the valleys …
articles.content:
The deep valleys transported vast amounts of meltwater away from under the ice sheets that covered the UK and Europe. Credit: James Kirkham / BAS

articles.title: Fianna Fáil and Fine Gael politicians claim Mick Wallace and Clare Daly 'disgracing themselves' over Ukraine - Independent.ie
articles.description: MEPs Mick Wallace and Clare Daly are “utterly disgracing themselves” in the European Parliament after they voted not to support a resolution condemning Russia, Fine Gael TD Neale Richmond has said.

articles.title: Covid wave looms in Europe as booster campaign makes slow start - CNN
articles.description: A new Covid-19 wave appears to be brewing in Europe as cooler weather arrives, with public health experts warning that vaccine fatigue and confusion over types of shots available will likely limit booster uptake.
